column3: SEEDS FROM THE FLOWERS OF THE VALLEY ARE PRESSED INTO A MILKY PASTE AND BOILED WITH THE RICHEST OF COCOA FROM DEEP IN THE MYSTICAL FOREST!
LEAVES FROM MATCHA PLANTS GROWING AROUND THE VALLEY. THEY ARE PRESSED INTO A CREAM AND THEN LET TO STEW UNTIL ALL THE BUBBLES POP AND THE TEXTURE IS PERFECT!
DIFFERENT BERRIES GATHERED FROM AROUND THE MYSTICAL FOREST WERE DRIED AND CRUSHED TO MAKE THE PERFECT FRUIT FLAVORED TEA!
THE RAREST, MOST DELICIOUS MUSHROOMS FROM THE MYSTICAL FOREST HAVE ALL BEEN MIXED INTO THIS BREW, MAKING IT TASTY AND HEALTHY!
HERBS GROWN IN THE VALLEY WERE PRESSED INTO A TONIC WHICH CONTAINS THE PURE ESSENCE OF LAND, GIVING IT A POTENT HEALING ENERGY AS WELL AS AROMA!
THIS FAVORITE AMONGST THE PEOPLE OF LAND IS MADE OF COFFEE BEANS THAT GROW IN THE JUNGLE AROUND THE MOUNTAINS. IT PACKS A REAL PUNCH!
ACORNS FROM THE FOREST FLOOR ARE CRUSHED INTO A POWDER AND STEEPED WITH WATER AND SPICES TO CREATE A FROTHY, COMFORTING DRINK!
FRESH CITRUS FRUITS GROWING IN THE VALLEY ARE JUICED INTO THE PUREST OF WATER TO CREATE AN EXCEPTIONALLY REFRESHING AND HEALTHY DRINK!
THE MOST DELECTABLE HONEY OF THE VALLEY IS BOILED WITH WATER AND ALLOWED TO FERMENT. THE RESULT IS A DRINK THAT WARMS YOU FROM DEEP WITHIN!
RAW GINGER IS MIXED WITH HERBS FROM THE MYSTICAL FOREST AND ALL OF THIS ALLOWED TO FERMENT WITH WATER UNTIL IT BECOMES A BUBBLY TONIC THAT COULD BRIGHTEN ANY DAY!
